aerial_servant.name: A non-corporeal elemental creature summoned by powerful magic, typically appearing as an invisible whirlwind that serves its summoner
aerial_servant.special_defenses: Can be hit only by magic weapons, Invisibility
aerial_servant.description: A non-corporeal elemental creature summoned by powerful magic, typically appearing as an invisible whirlwind that serves its summoner.

anhkheg.name: A large, burrowing insectoid monster known for its powerful bite and ability to spit corrosive acid
anhkheg.description: A large, burrowing insectoid monster known for its powerful bite and ability to spit corrosive acid.

ant_giant.name: Massive, aggressive insects that travel in dangerous colonies, often capable of overwhelming targets with sheer numbers
ant_giant.special_attacks: Warriors have a poison sting (3-12 damage, save for 1-4)
ant_giant.description: Massive, aggressive insects that travel in dangerous colonies, often capable of overwhelming targets with sheer numbers.

ape.name: A large, strong primate found in jungles and wild areas, usually neutral but aggressive if disturbed
ape.special_attacks: Rending: If it hits with both hands, it does an additional 1-6 damage.
ape.description: A large, strong primate found in jungles and wild areas, usually neutral but aggressive if disturbed.

axebeak.name: A tall, flightless, ostrich-like bird with a sharp, heavy beak, known for its speed and territorial aggression
axebeak.description: A tall, flightless, ostrich-like bird with a sharp, heavy beak, known for its speed and territorial aggression.

baboon.name: A common, intelligent primate that often attacks in noisy, overwhelming packs
baboon.description: A common, intelligent primate that often attacks in noisy, overwhelming packs.

badger.name: A small, fierce digging mammal that, when giant, poses a significant threat with its teeth and claws
badger.description: A small, fierce digging mammal that, when giant, poses a significant threat with its teeth and claws.

baluchitherium.name: An enormous, extinct rhinoceros-like mammal, one of the largest land creatures, highly dangerous when angered
baluchitherium.description: An enormous, extinct rhinoceros-like mammal, one of the largest land creatures, highly dangerous when angered.

barracuda.name: A large, predatory fish with sharp teeth and an aggressive nature, known for fast, sudden attacks
barracuda.description: A large, predatory fish with sharp teeth and an aggressive nature, known for fast, sudden attacks.

basilisk.name: A reptile known for its deadly gaze that can turn victims to stone and its venomous bite

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

basilisk.description: A reptile known for its deadly gaze that can turn victims to stone and its venomous bite.

bear.name: A powerful, omnivorous mammal, often aggressive, including black, brown, and polar varieties
bear.special_attacks: Hug: If a bear scores a paw hit with an 18 or better it also hugs for additional damage (2-8 to 2-16).
bear.special_defenses: Brown and cave bears continue to fight for 1-4 rounds after reaching 0 to -8 hit points.
bear.description: A powerful, omnivorous mammal, often aggressive, including black, brown, and polar varieties.

beaver_giant.name: An unusually large version of the common aquatic rodent, capable of felling large trees and building massive dams
beaver_giant.description: An unusually large version of the common aquatic rodent, capable of felling large trees and building massive dams.

beetle_giant.name: Massive insects of various types (e
beetle_giant.special_attacks: Bombardier: Acid cloud. Fire: None. Boring: None. Rhinoceros: None. Stag: None. Water: None.
beetle_giant.treasure_type: Nil (Boring Beetle: C, R, S, T)
beetle_giant.description: Massive insects of various types (e.g., Bombardier, Fire, Rhinoceros), often used as mounts or threats in dungeons.

beholder.name: A terrifying, spherical creature with one central eye and numerous eyestalks, each projecting a different magical power
beholder.special_attacks: Magic: 10 small eyes on top stalks, each with a different spell-like function (Charm Person, Charm Monster, Sleep, Telekinesis, Flesh to Stone, Disintegrate, Fear, Slow, Cause Serious Wounds, Death Ray).
beholder.special_defenses: Anti-magic ray from central eye projects a 14" cone of anti-magic.
beholder.description: A terrifying, spherical creature with one central eye and numerous eyestalks, each projecting a different magical power.

black_pudding.name: A massive, mobile, black glob of corrosive ooze that dissolves organic and metal substances alike
black_pudding.special_attacks: Dissolves wood and metal: Corrodes chainmail in 1 round, plate mail in 2. Can flow through small cracks.
black_pudding.special_defenses: Immune to cold and lightning. Blows from weapons break it into smaller parts, each able to attack.
black_pudding.magic_resistance: Immune to spells except for fire which causes normal damage.
black_pudding.description: A massive, mobile, black glob of corrosive ooze that dissolves organic and metal substances alike.

blink_dog.name: A dog-like creature with the ability to teleport short distances (blink) as part of its attack and defense maneuvers
blink_dog.special_defenses: Teleportation ('Blinking') at will, appears 1-3' from opponent.
blink_dog.description: A dog-like creature with the ability to teleport short distances (blink) as part of its attack and defense maneuvers.

boar.name: A wild swine known for its relentless, charging attacks and tusks
boar.special_defenses: Fights for 1-2 rounds after reaching 0 to -6 hit points
boar.description: A wild swine known for its relentless, charging attacks and tusks.

brain_mole.name: A subterranean mammal known for burrowing into the skulls of victims and consuming their brains
brain_mole.description: A subterranean mammal known for burrowing into the skulls of victims and consuming their brains.

brownie.name: A helpful, tiny humanoid creature from folklore, known for performing chores in exchange for small gifts
brownie.special_attacks: Spells: protection from evil, ventriloquism, dancing lights, continual light, mirror image, confusion, and dimension door, once per day.
brownie.special_defenses: Save as 9th level cleric, never surprised, can become invisible.
brownie.description: A helpful, tiny humanoid creature from folklore, known for performing chores in exchange for small gifts.

buffalo.name: A large, powerful herd animal, usually peaceful but extremely dangerous when stampeding or protecting its young
buffalo.description: A large, powerful herd animal, usually peaceful but extremely dangerous when stampeding or protecting its young.

bugbear.name: A large, hairy, goblinoid creature known for its stealth and preference for ambushes
bugbear.treasure_type: Individuals J, K, L, M; B in lair
bugbear.description: A large, hairy, goblinoid creature known for its stealth and preference for ambushes.

bulette.name: A large, plated monster known as the ‘land shark’ due to its ability to leap out of the ground and devour targets
bulette.description: A large, plated monster known as the ‘land shark’ due to its ability to leap out of the ground and devour targets.

bull.name: A powerful male bovine known for its charging attack and sheer physical strength
bull.description: A powerful male bovine known for its charging attack and sheer physical strength.

camel_wild.name: An aggressive, unruly variety of camel found in deserts, capable of spitting foul substances
camel_wild.special_attacks: Spitting: 50% chance to spit, 25% chance of blinding for 1-3 rounds.
camel_wild.description: An aggressive, unruly variety of camel found in deserts, capable of spitting foul substances.

carrion_crawler.name: A horrific, segmented scavenger with multiple paralyzing tentacles and an appetite for rotting flesh
carrion_crawler.special_attacks: Paralyzing touch from its 8 tentacles, save vs. paralyzation or be paralyzed.
carrion_crawler.description: A horrific, segmented scavenger with multiple paralyzing tentacles and an appetite for rotting flesh.

catoblepas.name: A sluggish, swamp-dwelling beast whose foul breath or gaze can cause death or paralysis
catoblepas.special_attacks: Gaze causes death, save vs. death ray to avoid.
catoblepas.description: A sluggish, swamp-dwelling beast whose foul breath or gaze can cause death or paralysis.

cattle_wild.name: Feral cows or oxen, capable of trampling threats when encountered in large numbers
cattle_wild.special_attacks: Stampede: 25% chance to stampede, trampling causes 1-4 damage per creature.
cattle_wild.description: Feral cows or oxen, capable of trampling threats when encountered in large numbers.

centaur.name: A creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse, usually peaceful forest dwellers
centaur.treasure_type: M, Q, with each; D, I, T in lair
centaur.description: A creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse, usually peaceful forest dwellers.

centipede_giant.name: A monstrously large insect with a venomous bite that often delivers painful, paralytic poison
centipede_giant.special_attacks: Poison: save vs. poison at +4 or not fatal, but causes intense pain.
centipede_giant.description: A monstrously large insect with a venomous bite that often delivers painful, paralytic poison.

cerebral_parasite.name: A small, worm-like creature that burrows into the brains of living hosts to control and feed on them
cerebral_parasite.special_attacks: Infestation: Drains psionic energy when abilities are used.
cerebral_parasite.special_defenses: Not harmed except by cure disease
cerebral_parasite.description: A small, worm-like creature that burrows into the brains of living hosts to control and feed on them.

chimera.name: A monstrous hybrid creature with the heads of a goat, a lion, and a dragon, often capable of breathing fire
chimera.special_attacks: Breath weapon: Dragon head can breathe fire (50% chance) for 3-24 damage.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

chimera.description: A monstrous hybrid creature with the heads of a goat, a lion, and a dragon, often capable of breathing fire.

cockatrice.name: A small, magical bird whose touch or bite can instantly turn a living creature to stone
cockatrice.special_attacks: Touch turns to stone, save vs. petrification to avoid.
cockatrice.description: A small, magical bird whose touch or bite can instantly turn a living creature to stone.

couatl.name: A beautiful, winged serpent, highly intelligent, benevolent, and often possessing powerful magical abilities
couatl.special_attacks: Poison, magic use (5th level magic-user and/or 7th level cleric), Constriction
couatl.description: A beautiful, winged serpent, highly intelligent, benevolent, and often possessing powerful magical abilities.

crab_giant.name: Massive crustaceans found near water, capable of crushing foes with their large claws
crab_giant.description: Massive crustaceans found near water, capable of crushing foes with their large claws.

crayfish_giant.name: Large, freshwater lobsters that inhabit rivers and lakes, known for their powerful, snapping pincers
crayfish_giant.description: Large, freshwater lobsters that inhabit rivers and lakes, known for their powerful, snapping pincers.

crocodile.name: A large, scaly, amphibious reptile found in tropical waters, known for its death roll attack
crocodile.description: A large, scaly, amphibious reptile found in tropical waters, known for its death roll attack.

demon.name: A chaotic evil outsider from the Abyss, possessing immense power and representing various forms of corruption and destruction
demon.special_attacks: Darkness, Teleportation, Gate, and others depending on type.

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

demon.description: A chaotic evil outsider from the Abyss, possessing immense power and representing various forms of corruption and destruction.

devil.name: A lawful evil outsider from the Nine Hells, focused on corruption, deals, and strict hierarchical evil
devil.special_attacks: Charm Person, Suggestion, Illusion, Infravision, Teleportation, Know Alignment, Cause Fear, Animate Dead, and others depending on type.

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

devil.description: A lawful evil outsider from the Nine Hells, focused on corruption, deals, and strict hierarchical evil.

dinosaur.name: Any of a variety of large, primeval reptiles (e
dinosaur.description: Any of a variety of large, primeval reptiles (e.g., Tyrannosaurus, Triceratops), ranging from herbivores to apex predators.

displacer_beast.name: A feline predator with two tentacles on its shoulders, constantly surrounded by an illusion that makes it appear to be a few feet from its actual location
displacer_beast.special_defenses: -2 on opponent's attack dice, Save as 12th level fighter +2 on die
displacer_beast.description: A feline predator with two tentacles on its shoulders, constantly surrounded by an illusion that makes it appear to be a few feet from its actual location.

djinni.name: A benevolent elemental spirit of air, often powerful, intelligent, and capable of granting limited wishes
djinni.special_attacks: Create food, water, wine, soft goods, wooden items, metal items, illusion, become invisible, assume gaseous form, wind walk, or form a whirlwind.
djinni.description: A benevolent elemental spirit of air, often powerful, intelligent, and capable of granting limited wishes.

dog.name: A common domesticated canine, ranging from loyal companions to dangerous feral hunters
dog.description: A common domesticated canine, ranging from loyal companions to dangerous feral hunters.

dolphin.name: An intelligent, friendly aquatic mammal, highly valued for its helpful nature and ability to communicate
dolphin.description: An intelligent, friendly aquatic mammal, highly valued for its helpful nature and ability to communicate.

doppleganger.name: A cunning humanoid creature capable of magically assuming the appearance and voice of any person it chooses
doppleganger.special_defenses: Save as 10th level fighter, immune to sleep and charm spells.
doppleganger.description: A cunning humanoid creature capable of magically assuming the appearance and voice of any person it chooses.

dragon.name: A massive, scaled reptilian creature of immense power, intelligence, and magical ability, typically categorized by color
dragon.description: A massive, scaled reptilian creature of immense power, intelligence, and magical ability, typically categorized by color.

dragonne.name: A powerful beast that is a cross between a great cat and a dragon, but lacks the dragon’s intelligence and magical breath
dragonne.special_attacks: Roar: causes weakness unless save vs. paralysis, deafens those within 30' for 2-12 rounds.
dragonne.description: A powerful beast that is a cross between a great cat and a dragon, but lacks the dragon’s intelligence and magical breath.

dragon_turtle.name: A colossal, amphibious reptile resembling a turtle with draconic features, inhabiting deep seas and often demanding tribute from passing ships
dragon_turtle.special_attacks: Breath weapon: Cloud of scalding steam 6" long, 4" wide, 4" high.

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

dragon_turtle.description: A colossal, amphibious reptile resembling a turtle with draconic features, inhabiting deep seas and often demanding tribute from passing ships.

dryad.name: A beautiful female spirit tied to a specific tree, which dies if the tree is destroyed, known for charming travelers
dryad.special_attacks: Charm person spell at -3 to save, three times per day.
dryad.description: A beautiful female spirit tied to a specific tree, which dies if the tree is destroyed, known for charming travelers.

dwarf.name: A short, stout humanoid race known for their skill in mining, stonework, and craftsmanship
dwarf.description: A short, stout humanoid race known for their skill in mining, stonework, and craftsmanship.

eagle_giant.name: An enormous bird of prey often used as a majestic mount or powerful ally in high mountain ranges
eagle_giant.special_attacks: Dive: +4 to hit, double claw damage, no beak attack.
eagle_giant.special_defenses: Never surprised unless in lair or at night.
eagle_giant.description: An enormous bird of prey often used as a majestic mount or powerful ally in high mountain ranges.

ear_seeker.name: A tiny, flying parasitic creature that attempts to burrow into the ear canal to reach the brain
ear_seeker.special_attacks: Burrows into ear to reach and eat brain.
ear_seeker.description: A tiny, flying parasitic creature that attempts to burrow into the ear canal to reach the brain.

eel.name: A snake-like fish, including electric varieties, capable of delivering a shocking jolt
eel.special_attacks: Electric: Jolt for 3-24 (within 5'), 2-16 (5-10'), 1-8 (10-15'). Weed: Poison bite.
eel.size: M (9' long), M (20' long), S (6' long)
eel.description: A snake-like fish, including electric varieties, capable of delivering a shocking jolt.

efreeti.name: A malicious elemental spirit of fire, known for its immense size, fiery appearance, and aggressive nature
efreeti.special_attacks: Produce flame, pyrotechnics, grant up to three wishes, become invisible, assume gaseous form, detect magic, enlarge, polymorph self, create an illusion, create a wall of fire.
efreeti.description: A malicious elemental spirit of fire, known for its immense size, fiery appearance, and aggressive nature.

elemental.name: A creature composed entirely of one of the four classic elements: Air, Earth, Fire, or Water
elemental.special_attacks: Air: Whirlwind. Earth: Full damage to creatures on the ground. Fire: Sets fire to inflammable materials. Water: Full effect in water, can upset small craft.
elemental.description: A creature composed entirely of one of the four classic elements: Air, Earth, Fire, or Water.

elephant.name: A massive, powerful, intelligent terrestrial mammal, usually gentle but dangerous when enraged or threatened
elephant.description: A massive, powerful, intelligent terrestrial mammal, usually gentle but dangerous when enraged or threatened.

elf.name: A tall, graceful, long-lived humanoid race known for their connection to nature and magic
elf.special_defenses: Move silently and blend into vegetation to become invisible.
elf.treasure_type: Individuals N; G, S, T in lair
elf.description: A tall, graceful, long-lived humanoid race known for their connection to nature and magic.

ettin.name: A large, two-headed giant known for its low intelligence and perpetual squabbling between its heads
ettin.treasure_type: Individual O, C, Y in lair
ettin.description: A large, two-headed giant known for its low intelligence and perpetual squabbling between its heads.

eye_floating.name: A magical, detached eyeball that drifts through the air, often used as a scout or alarm by powerful wizards
eye_floating.description: A magical, detached eyeball that drifts through the air, often used as a scout or alarm by powerful wizards.

eye_of_the_deep.name: A large, terrifying aquatic Beholder relative that guards deep sea tunnels and treasures
eye_of_the_deep.special_attacks: Central eye flash stuns for 2-8 rounds (save vs. death ray). Two smaller eyes can cast illusion, hold person, or hold monster.
eye_of_the_deep.description: A large, terrifying aquatic Beholder relative that guards deep sea tunnels and treasures.

flightless_bird.name: Various large, terrestrial birds (e
flightless_bird.description: Various large, terrestrial birds (e.g., giant ostriches) that rely on speed and powerful kicks for defense.

frog_giant.name: A large, amphibious jumper with a long, sticky tongue capable of pulling victims into its massive maw
frog_giant.special_attacks: Tongue attack at +4 to hit to draw prey to mouth; Swallow whole on a score of 20 (Frog, Giant). Talons and teeth (Killer). Poisonous skin and bite (Poisonous).
frog_giant.description: A large, amphibious jumper with a long, sticky tongue capable of pulling victims into its massive maw.

fungi_violet.name: A type of mobile, sentient fungus that attempts to lash out and paralyze victims with its tendrils
fungi_violet.special_attacks: Secretion rots flesh in one round unless a save vs. poison is made or cure disease is used.
fungi_violet.description: A type of mobile, sentient fungus that attempts to lash out and paralyze victims with its tendrils.

gar_giant.name: A massive, predatory freshwater fish with long, toothed jaws, found in large rivers and lakes
gar_giant.special_attacks: Swallow whole on a score of 20.
gar_giant.description: A massive, predatory freshwater fish with long, toothed jaws, found in large rivers and lakes.

gargoyle.name: A magical, winged creature sculpted from stone, known for blending in with architecture and ambushing passersby
gargoyle.description: A magical, winged creature sculpted from stone, known for blending in with architecture and ambushing passersby.

gas_spore.name: A floating orb that looks exactly like a Beholder but is actually a fragile fungus that explodes upon impact, releasing deadly spores
gas_spore.special_attacks: Explodes if hit for 1 point, dealing 6-36 damage to creatures within 20'. Shoots rhizomes into flesh on contact, causing death in 24 hours unless cured.
gas_spore.description: A floating orb that looks exactly like a Beholder but is actually a fragile fungus that explodes upon impact, releasing deadly spores.

gelatinous_cube.name: A large, transparent, amorphous ooze that silently glides through dungeons, dissolving organic matter and trapping treasure within its body
gelatinous_cube.special_attacks: Paralyzation, surprise on 1-3. Anesthetizes for 5-20 rounds unless a save vs. paralyzation is made.
gelatinous_cube.special_defenses: Immune to electricity, fear, holds, paralyzation, polymorph, and sleep-based attacks. Cold does half or no damage.
gelatinous_cube.treasure_type: J, K, L, M, N, Q, plus a potion or dagger
gelatinous_cube.description: A large, transparent, amorphous ooze that silently glides through dungeons, dissolving organic matter and trapping treasure within its body.

ghast.name: A more powerful, stench-ridden form of ghoul whose touch can paralyze victims
ghast.special_attacks: Paralyzing touch affects elves. Carrion stench in a 10' radius causes -2 'to hit' penalty unless save vs. poison is made.
ghast.special_defenses: Immune to sleep and charm spells. Cold iron causes double damage.
ghast.description: A more powerful, stench-ridden form of ghoul whose touch can paralyze victims.

ghost.name: The spectral, non-corporeal remnant of a deceased person, usually bound by strong emotion or an unfinished task
ghost.special_attacks: Sight causes aging and panic. Can cast magic jar at will.
ghost.special_defenses: Can only be struck by silver (50% damage) or magical weapons. Can become ethereal.
ghost.magic_resistance: Immune to spells from non-ethereal creatures.
ghost.description: The spectral, non-corporeal remnant of a deceased person, usually bound by strong emotion or an unfinished task.

ghoul.name: An undead humanoid that feeds on flesh, usually possessing a paralytic touch
ghoul.special_attacks: Paralyzing touch, does not affect elves.
ghoul.special_defenses: Immune to sleep and charm spells.
ghoul.description: An undead humanoid that feeds on flesh, usually possessing a paralytic touch.

giant.name: A huge, humanoid creature of immense strength, categorized into various types (e

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

giant.description: A huge, humanoid creature of immense strength, categorized into various types (e.g., Hill, Stone, Cloud, Frost).

gnoll.name: A hyena-headed, vicious humanoid race known for their raiding, scavenging, and cruelty
gnoll.treasure_type: Individuals L, M; D, Q (x5), S in lair
gnoll.description: A hyena-headed, vicious humanoid race known for their raiding, scavenging, and cruelty.

gnome.name: A small, industrious humanoid race known for their love of inventions, intricate mechanics, and gems
gnome.special_attacks: +1 to hit vs. kobolds and goblins.
gnome.special_defenses: Save at 4 levels higher. +1 on saves vs. magic and poison.
gnome.treasure_type: Individuals M (x3); C, Q (x20) in lair
gnome.description: A small, industrious humanoid race known for their love of inventions, intricate mechanics, and gems.

goat_giant.name: A monstrously large version of the common caprine, dangerous for its massive, charging head-butts
goat_giant.description: A monstrously large version of the common caprine, dangerous for its massive, charging head-butts.

goblin.name: A small, green-skinned, malicious humanoid race, known for their large numbers and cowardice
goblin.description: A small, green-skinned, malicious humanoid race, known for their large numbers and cowardice.

golem.name: An artificial creature constructed from various materials (e
golem.special_attacks: Clay: Haste. Flesh: Berserk. Iron: Poison gas. Stone: Slow spell.
golem.special_defenses: Immunity to most spells and normal weapons.
golem.description: An artificial creature constructed from various materials (e.g., clay, stone, iron) and animated by elemental spirit or magic.

gorgon.name: A massive, iron-plated bull whose breath can turn victims to stone (petrify them)
gorgon.special_attacks: Breath turns to stone, save vs. petrification to avoid.
gorgon.description: A massive, iron-plated bull whose breath can turn victims to stone (petrify them).

gray_ooze.name: A type of amorphous creature that corrodes metal, often lurking silently in stagnant pools
gray_ooze.special_defenses: Immune to spells, heat, and cold. Lightning causes full damage.
gray_ooze.description: A type of amorphous creature that corrodes metal, often lurking silently in stagnant pools.

green_slime.name: A dangerous, creeping mold that instantly dissolves flesh and is immune to most weapons, requiring fire to destroy
green_slime.special_attacks: Turns creature into green slime in 1-4 rounds. Eats away wood and metal.
green_slime.special_defenses: Can be scraped off, excised, frozen, or burned. Immune to other attacks.
green_slime.description: A dangerous, creeping mold that instantly dissolves flesh and is immune to most weapons, requiring fire to destroy.

griffon.name: A magnificent hybrid creature with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle, often used as a noble mount
griffon.description: A magnificent hybrid creature with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle, often used as a noble mount.

groaning_spirit.name: A type of terrifying female ghost (Banshee) whose wailing can instantly cause death
groaning_spirit.special_attacks: Keening causes death for those within 30' who fail a save vs. magic.
groaning_spirit.description: A type of terrifying female ghost (Banshee) whose wailing can instantly cause death.

halfling.name: A small, nimble humanoid race known for their love of comfort, good food, and surprising luck
halfling.special_defenses: Save at 4 levels higher. Surprise opponents on 1-4. Invisibility in natural terrain.
halfling.description: A small, nimble humanoid race known for their love of comfort, good food, and surprising luck.

harpy.name: A monstrous creature with the body of a vulture and the upper torso of a woman, known for enchanting sailors with its song
harpy.special_attacks: Singing & charm: Lures victims closer unless a save vs. magic is made. Touch charms creatures that fail a save vs. magic.
harpy.description: A monstrous creature with the body of a vulture and the upper torso of a woman, known for enchanting sailors with its song.

hell_hound.name: A dog-like creature from the lower planes, capable of breathing fire and relentless tracking
hell_hound.special_attacks: Breathe fire for damage equal to its hit dice (save for half).
hell_hound.special_defenses: Surprised only on 1, see invisible objects 50% of the time.
hell_hound.description: A dog-like creature from the lower planes, capable of breathing fire and relentless tracking.

herd_animal.name: Generic term for large, non-aggressive mammals (like deer or antelope) that travel in groups
herd_animal.description: Generic term for large, non-aggressive mammals (like deer or antelope) that travel in groups.

hippocampus.name: A beautiful marine creature with the front quarters of a horse and the tail of a fish, sometimes ridden by tritons
hippocampus.description: A beautiful marine creature with the front quarters of a horse and the tail of a fish, sometimes ridden by tritons.

hippogriff.name: A magnificent hybrid creature with the front quarters of an eagle and the body of a horse, often used as a swift, loyal mount
hippogriff.description: A magnificent hybrid creature with the front quarters of an eagle and the body of a horse, often used as a swift, loyal mount.

hippopotamus.name: A large, semi-aquatic mammal, highly territorial and aggressive when its space is invaded
hippopotamus.description: A large, semi-aquatic mammal, highly territorial and aggressive when its space is invaded.

hobgoblin.name: A larger, more disciplined, and militaristic cousin of the goblin, highly organized in warfare
hobgoblin.treasure_type: Individuals J, M, D, Q (x5) in lair
hobgoblin.description: A larger, more disciplined, and militaristic cousin of the goblin, highly organized in warfare.

homunculus.name: A small, artificial, winged humanoid constructed by a wizard to serve as a familiar and spy
homunculus.special_attacks: Bite causes sleep (save vs. magic or fall asleep for 5-30 minutes).
homunculus.special_defenses: Saves as its creator. Telepathic link with creator.
homunculus.description: A small, artificial, winged humanoid constructed by a wizard to serve as a familiar and spy.

horse.name: A common domesticated riding animal, categorized by type (e
horse.description: A common domesticated riding animal, categorized by type (e.g., light warhorse, heavy workhorse).

hydra.name: A multi-headed serpentine creature that regenerates two new heads for every one that is severed
hydra.special_attacks: Lernaean Hydra: Grows two heads for each one severed unless stump is burned. Pyrohydra: Breathes fire twice per day per head for 8 damage.
hydra.description: A multi-headed serpentine creature that regenerates two new heads for every one that is severed.

hyena.name: A common scavenging mammal, often found in packs and associated with the gnoll race
hyena.description: A common scavenging mammal, often found in packs and associated with the gnoll race.

imp.name: A small, winged demon, often summoned by warlocks and wizards to serve as a spy or familiar
imp.special_attacks: Tail sting: save vs. poison or die.
imp.special_defenses: Regenerates 1 hp/round. Immune to cold, fire, electricity. Can only be harmed by silver or magical weapons.
imp.description: A small, winged demon, often summoned by warlocks and wizards to serve as a spy or familiar.

intellect_devourer.name: A small, brain-like creature that can consume a victim’s brain and take over its body, masquerading as the host
intellect_devourer.special_attacks: Psionic attack (ego whip or id insinuation). Can take over the body of a victim.
intellect_devourer.special_defenses: Immune to normal weapons. Magical weapons +3 or better do 1 damage. Takes 1 damage per die from lightning. Death spell has 25% chance of success.
intellect_devourer.description: A small, brain-like creature that can consume a victim’s brain and take over its body, masquerading as the host.

invisible_stalker.name: A powerful elemental creature of air summoned to pursue and kill a single target until the task is complete
invisible_stalker.description: A powerful elemental creature of air summoned to pursue and kill a single target until the task is complete.

irish_deer.name: A massive, prehistoric species of deer known for its enormous antlers
irish_deer.description: A massive, prehistoric species of deer known for its enormous antlers.

ixitxachitl.name: A type of intelligent, evil manta-ray like aquatic monster that uses a psychic suggestion to lure prey
ixitxachitl.description: A type of intelligent, evil manta-ray like aquatic monster that uses a psychic suggestion to lure prey.

jackal.name: A common scavenging canine, often found in arid regions and deserts
jackal.description: A common scavenging canine, often found in arid regions and deserts.

jackalwere.name: A lycanthrope that transforms into a jackal or a hybrid form, usually found in desert cultures
jackalwere.description: A lycanthrope that transforms into a jackal or a hybrid form, usually found in desert cultures.

jaguar.name: A large, solitary spotted cat, known for its strength and ability to climb and swim
jaguar.description: A large, solitary spotted cat, known for its strength and ability to climb and swim.

ki-rin.name: A majestic, benevolent, and highly intelligent celestial creature, resembling a large, winged unicorn or deer
ki-rin.special_attacks: Magic use: Spells of all levels at 18th level quality.
ki-rin.description: A majestic, benevolent, and highly intelligent celestial creature, resembling a large, winged unicorn or deer.

kobold.name: A small, reptilian humanoid known for their traps, warrens, and worship of dragons
kobold.treasure_type: Individuals J, O, Q (x5) in lair
kobold.description: A small, reptilian humanoid known for their traps, warrens, and worship of dragons.

lamia.name: A beautiful, seductive creature with the lower body of a great cat, known for luring travelers to their doom
lamia.special_attacks: Wisdom drain: Permanently drains 1 point of wisdom with a touch. Spells: charm person, mirror image, suggestion, and illusion once per day.
lamia.description: A beautiful, seductive creature with the lower body of a great cat, known for luring travelers to their doom.

lammasu.name: A benevolent celestial creature with the body of a lion, the wings of an eagle, and a human head
lammasu.special_attacks: Clerical spells up to 4th level, holy word, invisibility, dimension door.
lammasu.special_defenses: Protection from evil, +1 or better weapon to hit.
lammasu.description: A benevolent celestial creature with the body of a lion, the wings of an eagle, and a human head.

lamprey.name: A primitive, jawless fish known for its sucker mouth and teeth used to latch onto and feed off of larger creatures
lamprey.special_attacks: Drain blood for 1-2 (Normal) or 10 (Giant) damage per round.
lamprey.description: A primitive, jawless fish known for its sucker mouth and teeth used to latch onto and feed off of larger creatures.

larva.name: The initial, worm-like stage of development for certain planar evil outsiders, such as demons and devils
larva.description: The initial, worm-like stage of development for certain planar evil outsiders, such as demons and devils.

leech_giant.name: Monstrously large blood-sucking invertebrates found in swamps and rivers
leech_giant.special_attacks: Drain blood: 1 hit point of damage per hit die it possesses, each round. 50% chance of causing a fatal disease.
leech_giant.description: Monstrously large blood-sucking invertebrates found in swamps and rivers.

leopard.name: A common spotted great cat, known for its stealth and ability to hunt from trees
leopard.description: A common spotted great cat, known for its stealth and ability to hunt from trees.

leprechaun.name: A diminutive, whimsical faerie of Irish folklore, known for hiding pots of gold and their trickery
leprechaun.special_attacks: Invisibility, polymorph non-living objects, create illusions, and ventriloquism at will.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

leprechaun.description: A diminutive, whimsical faerie of Irish folklore, known for hiding pots of gold and their trickery.

leucrotta.name: A monstrous hybrid of a giant badger and a stag, known for imitating human voices to lure prey
leucrotta.special_attacks: Can imitate the voice of a man or woman to lure prey.
leucrotta.special_defenses: Kicks backwards with both hooves for 1-6 damage each when retreating.
leucrotta.description: A monstrous hybrid of a giant badger and a stag, known for imitating human voices to lure prey.

lich.name: A powerful undead spellcaster who has preserved their soul in a phylactery to achieve immortality
lich.special_attacks: Touch causes paralysis. Sight causes fear in creatures below 5th level.
lich.special_defenses: +1 or better weapon to hit. Immune to charm, sleep, enfeeblement, polymorph, cold, electricity, insanity or death spells.
lich.description: A powerful undead spellcaster who has preserved their soul in a phylactery to achieve immortality.

lion.name: The majestic king of beasts, a powerful, tawny great cat often found in pride groups
lion.description: The majestic king of beasts, a powerful, tawny great cat often found in pride groups.

lizard.name: A common reptile, including various types like the monitor lizard, often found in warm environments
lizard.special_attacks: Fire: Breathes a puff of flame for 2-12 damage. Giant: Double damage on a score of 20. Minotaur: Picks up prey on a score of 20. Subterranean: Double damage on a score of 20.
lizard.special_defenses: See below for each type of lizard
lizard.size: L (30' long), L (15' long), L (40' long), L (20' long)
lizard.treasure_type: B, Q (x10) (Fire), Nil (Giant), J-N, Q, C (Minotaur), O, P, Q (x5) (Subterranean)

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

lizard.description: A common reptile, including various types like the monitor lizard, often found in warm environments.

lizard_man.name: A primitive, scaled humanoid race found in swamps and marshes, known for their tribal life and simple weapons
lizard_man.special_attacks: Some use barbed darts (1-4 damage) or javelins (1-6 damage).
lizard_man.description: A primitive, scaled humanoid race found in swamps and marshes, known for their tribal life and simple weapons.

locathah.name: An aquatic humanoid with fish-like features, usually organized in tribes in tropical seas
locathah.description: An aquatic humanoid with fish-like features, usually organized in tribes in tropical seas.

lurker_above.name: A creature that clings to the ceiling of caverns, resembling a dark, massive sheet of cloth, which drops onto unsuspecting victims
lurker_above.special_attacks: Smother: Constriction for 1-6 damage per round, smothers in 2-5 rounds.
lurker_above.description: A creature that clings to the ceiling of caverns, resembling a dark, massive sheet of cloth, which drops onto unsuspecting victims.

lycanthrope.name: A humanoid afflicted with a curse that allows them to transform into an animal (e
lycanthrope.special_defenses: Silver or +1 or better weapon to hit

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

lycanthrope.description: A humanoid afflicted with a curse that allows them to transform into an animal (e.g., werewolf, werebear).

lynx_giant.name: An enormous version of the wild cat, highly dangerous with sharp claws and stealth
lynx_giant.special_defenses: Surprised only on a 1. 75% accurate in detecting traps.
lynx_giant.description: An enormous version of the wild cat, highly dangerous with sharp claws and stealth.

mammoth.name: A massive, shaggy-haired prehistoric elephant found in cold climates
mammoth.description: A massive, shaggy-haired prehistoric elephant found in cold climates.

manticore.name: A monstrous hybrid with a human-like head, the body of a lion, and the wings of a dragon, capable of shooting razor-sharp tail spikes
manticore.special_attacks: Tail spikes: Fires a volley of 6 spikes for 1-6 damage each.
manticore.description: A monstrous hybrid with a human-like head, the body of a lion, and the wings of a dragon, capable of shooting razor-sharp tail spikes.

masher.name: A large, multi-legged, predatory insectoid creature that relies on crushing its prey with its bulk
masher.special_defenses: Poison spines: 4-8 dorsal spines, 4' long. Save vs. poison or be killed if struck.
masher.description: A large, multi-legged, predatory insectoid creature that relies on crushing its prey with its bulk.

mastodon.name: A large, extinct elephant-like mammal, known for its tusks and heavy frame
mastodon.description: A large, extinct elephant-like mammal, known for its tusks and heavy frame.

medusa.name: A monstrous female humanoid with living snakes for hair, whose gaze can instantly turn a living creature to stone
medusa.description: A monstrous female humanoid with living snakes for hair, whose gaze can instantly turn a living creature to stone.

men.name: The common humanoid race, including various classes and professions, ranging from peasants to knights

V.Maps or Magic: 2 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 85%

men.description: The common humanoid race, including various classes and professions, ranging from peasants to knights.

merman.name: A male aquatic humanoid with the upper body of a man and the lower body of a fish
merman.special_attacks: Some use grappling hooks to slow ships.
merman.description: A male aquatic humanoid with the upper body of a man and the lower body of a fish.

mimic.name: A highly intelligent, predatory creature capable of perfectly impersonating inanimate objects, such as chests or doors, to ambush prey
mimic.special_attacks: Glue: secretes a glue to hold fast any creature that touches it.
mimic.description: A highly intelligent, predatory creature capable of perfectly impersonating inanimate objects, such as chests or doors, to ambush prey.

mind_flayer.name: A highly intelligent, evil, tentacled humanoid creature that consumes the brains of sentient beings for sustenance
mind_flayer.special_attacks: Mind blast: psionic attack affecting creatures in a 6" cone. If tentacles hit, they draw out the brain in 1-4 rounds.
mind_flayer.description: A highly intelligent, evil, tentacled humanoid creature that consumes the brains of sentient beings for sustenance.

minotaur.name: A monstrous hybrid with the head of a bull and the body of a man, known for its immense strength and maze-dwelling habits
minotaur.description: A monstrous hybrid with the head of a bull and the body of a man, known for its immense strength and maze-dwelling habits.

mold.name: Various types of dangerous fungal growth (e
mold.description: Various types of dangerous fungal growth (e.g., russet mold, yellow mold) that cause harm when touched or inhaled.

morkoth.name: A bizarre, highly intelligent aquatic creature that builds complicated, deadly dimensional mazes to trap victims
morkoth.special_attacks: Hypnosis: tunnels form a hypnotic pattern, victims are charmed if they fail a save at -4.
morkoth.description: A bizarre, highly intelligent aquatic creature that builds complicated, deadly dimensional mazes to trap victims.

mule.name: A sterile hybrid of a donkey and a horse, valued for its stubborn endurance and sure-footedness
mule.description: A sterile hybrid of a donkey and a horse, valued for its stubborn endurance and sure-footedness.

mummy.name: An undead creature, typically the preserved body of a powerful ancient king or priest, cursed with a chilling touch and a fear aura
mummy.special_attacks: Fear: sight causes paralysis with fright for 1-4 rounds unless save vs. magic is made. Touch inflicts a rotting disease.
mummy.special_defenses: Can only be harmed by magical weapons (half damage). Immune to sleep, charm, hold, cold, poison, paralysis. Takes damage from fire and holy water.
mummy.description: An undead creature, typically the preserved body of a powerful ancient king or priest, cursed with a chilling touch and a fear aura.

naga.name: A type of intelligent, serpentine creature with both magical and physical prowess, often guarding ancient temples or treasures
naga.special_attacks: Guardian: Poisonous bite, constriction, spit poison, clerical spells. Spirit: Poisonous bite, charm gaze, magic-user and clerical spells. Water: Poisonous bite, magic-user spells.
naga.size: L (20' long), L (15' long), M (10' long)
naga.description: A type of intelligent, serpentine creature with both magical and physical prowess, often guarding ancient temples or treasures.

neo-otyugh.name: A massive, predatory aquatic blob with a huge maw, known for its ability to dissolve prey instantly
neo-otyugh.description: A massive, predatory aquatic blob with a huge maw, known for its ability to dissolve prey instantly.

night_hag.name: A hideous, powerful fiend that travels between planes to torment mortals through their dreams, stealing their souls for evil purposes
night_hag.special_attacks: Casts sleep spell. Can ride a sleeping victim ethereally, draining 1 point of constitution per night. Magic missile and ray of enfeeblement 3 times per day.
night_hag.special_defenses: Can only be harmed by silver, iron, or +3 or better weapons. Immune to sleep, charm, fear, fire, and cold-based spells.
night_hag.description: A hideous, powerful fiend that travels between planes to torment mortals through their dreams, stealing their souls for evil purposes.

nightmare.name: A fiendish, smoke-maned horse from the lower planes, used as a swift, terrifying mount by powerful evil beings
nightmare.special_attacks: Breathes a cloud of smoke, causing blindness and choking (-2 to hit and damage).
nightmare.special_defenses: Can become ethereal and travel the astral plane.
nightmare.description: A fiendish, smoke-maned horse from the lower planes, used as a swift, terrifying mount by powerful evil beings.

nixie.name: A mischievous and often vain female water spirit (faerie) that dwells in lakes and rivers
nixie.special_attacks: Charm: generate a powerful charm spell. Can cast water breathing once per day.
nixie.description: A mischievous and often vain female water spirit (faerie) that dwells in lakes and rivers.

nymph.name: A beautiful, benevolent female spirit tied to a specific natural location (e
nymph.special_attacks: Druidical cleric spells at 7th level. Looking at one causes blindness. If nude, an onlooker will die unless a save vs. magic is made.
nymph.description: A beautiful, benevolent female spirit tied to a specific natural location (e.g., spring, forest), known for their radiant beauty and protective nature.

ochre_jelly.name: A large, sluggish, yellow-orange amorphous ooze that dissolves flesh and is capable of splitting when struck by lightning
ochre_jelly.special_defenses: Lightning divides it into one or more smaller jellies, each doing one-half normal damage. Immune to most spells.
ochre_jelly.description: A large, sluggish, yellow-orange amorphous ooze that dissolves flesh and is capable of splitting when struck by lightning.

octopus_giant.name: A massive marine mollusk with long, powerful tentacles, capable of crushing and suffocating its prey
octopus_giant.special_attacks: Constriction: Tentacles constrict for 2-8 damage per round after hitting.
octopus_giant.special_defenses: Ink: Emits a cloud of black ink 4" high by 6" wide, by 6" long to escape.
octopus_giant.description: A massive marine mollusk with long, powerful tentacles, capable of crushing and suffocating its prey.

ogre.name: A large, brutish, and dim-witted humanoid giant known for its appetite for human flesh and crude weapons
ogre.treasure_type: Individuals M (x10), Q, B, S in lair
ogre.description: A large, brutish, and dim-witted humanoid giant known for its appetite for human flesh and crude weapons.

ogre_mage.name: A more intelligent and magically gifted version of the ogre, capable of flight, invisibility, and powerful spellcasting
ogre_mage.special_attacks: Magic use: fly, invisibility, darkness, polymorph, charm person, sleep, gaseous form, cone of cold.
ogre_mage.description: A more intelligent and magically gifted version of the ogre, capable of flight, invisibility, and powerful spellcasting.

orc.name: A brutish, aggressive, and numerous humanoid race known for their green skin, tusks, and warlike culture
orc.treasure_type: Individuals I; C, D, Q (x10), S in lair
orc.description: A brutish, aggressive, and numerous humanoid race known for their green skin, tusks, and warlike culture.

otter_giant.name: An unusually large version of the playful, semi-aquatic mammal, known for its sharp teeth and surprising strength
otter_giant.description: An unusually large version of the playful, semi-aquatic mammal, known for its sharp teeth and surprising strength.

otyugh.name: A grotesque, three-legged monster with a large maw and two tentacled arms, typically dwelling in refuse heaps and sewers
otyugh.special_attacks: Disease: Bite has a 90% chance to infect with disease.
otyugh.description: A grotesque, three-legged monster with a large maw and two tentacled arms, typically dwelling in refuse heaps and sewers.

owl_giant.name: A massive nocturnal bird of prey, known for its silent flight and powerful talons
owl_giant.description: A massive nocturnal bird of prey, known for its silent flight and powerful talons.

owlbear.name: A monstrous hybrid with the head of an owl and the body of a bear, known for its short temper and aggressive behavior
owlbear.special_attacks: Hug: If it scores a paw hit of 18 or better, it hugs for 2-16 additional damage.
owlbear.description: A monstrous hybrid with the head of an owl and the body of a bear, known for its short temper and aggressive behavior.

pegasus.name: A beautiful, winged horse, highly intelligent and often serving as a noble mount for good-aligned heroes
pegasus.description: A beautiful, winged horse, highly intelligent and often serving as a noble mount for good-aligned heroes.

peryton.name: A monstrous hybrid with the body of a stag and the wings and head of a giant eagle, known for eating human hearts and casting a human shadow
peryton.description: A monstrous hybrid with the body of a stag and the wings and head of a giant eagle, known for eating human hearts and casting a human shadow.

piercer.name: A conical creature that clings to the ceilings of caverns, dropping onto unsuspecting victims like a falling stalactite
piercer.special_attacks: 95% likely to surprise, drops from ceiling with +4 to hit.
piercer.description: A conical creature that clings to the ceilings of caverns, dropping onto unsuspecting victims like a falling stalactite.

pike_giant.name: A massive, carnivorous freshwater fish with a powerful bite, found in deep, cold lakes
pike_giant.description: A massive, carnivorous freshwater fish with a powerful bite, found in deep, cold lakes.

pixie.name: A tiny, winged faerie known for its mischievous nature, illusions, and ability to fly
pixie.special_attacks: Special arrows (+4 to hit) cause sleep or memory loss. Can cause confusion by touch.
pixie.special_defenses: Normally invisible, -4 to be hit. Can polymorph, create illusions, know alignment, dispel magic, and use Otto's Irresistable Dance.
pixie.description: A tiny, winged faerie known for its mischievous nature, illusions, and ability to fly.

porcupine_giant.name: A massive rodent covered in deadly, barbed quills that it can fire at attackers
porcupine_giant.special_attacks: Shoot quills: fires 1-8 quills from its tail for 1-4 damage each.
porcupine_giant.special_defenses: Quills: any attack within 6' suffers 1-4 quills in return.
porcupine_giant.description: A massive rodent covered in deadly, barbed quills that it can fire at attackers.

portuguese_man-o-war_giant.name: A large, floating marine creature with long, stinging tentacles that deliver paralyzing venom
portuguese_man-o-war_giant.special_attacks: Paralyzation: save vs. paralyzation or be paralyzed and devoured in 3-12 turns.
portuguese_man-o-war_giant.description: A large, floating marine creature with long, stinging tentacles that deliver paralyzing venom.

pseudo-dragon.name: A small, cute, winged reptilian familiar, highly intelligent and possessing a venomous tail barb
pseudo-dragon.special_attacks: Poison sting: +4 to hit, save vs. poison or enter a state of catalepsy for 1-6 days.
pseudo-dragon.special_defenses: Chameleon power: 80% undetectable. Can see invisible objects.
pseudo-dragon.description: A small, cute, winged reptilian familiar, highly intelligent and possessing a venomous tail barb.

purple_worm.name: A colossal, subterranean segmented worm that swallows its prey whole and possesses a paralyzing stinger on its tail
purple_worm.special_attacks: Swallow whole on a score of 20 or 4 over 'to hit'. Poisonous stinger: save vs. poison or die.
purple_worm.description: A colossal, subterranean segmented worm that swallows its prey whole and possesses a paralyzing stinger on its tail.

quasit.name: A small, winged demon, often serving as a familiar for chaotic evil spellcasters
quasit.special_attacks: Claw wounds drain 1 dexterity for 2-12 rounds. Can send out a blast of fear in a 3" radius.
quasit.special_defenses: Regenerates 1 hp/round. Immune to cold, fire, lightning. Can only be harmed by magical or cold iron weapons.
quasit.description: A small, winged demon, often serving as a familiar for chaotic evil spellcasters.

rakshasa.name: A powerful, cunning evil fiend from the lower planes, resembling a tiger with hands that bend backward, known for its illusions and magic
rakshasa.special_attacks: Magic use: Can cast 1st-3rd level magic-user spells and 1st level cleric spells. Employs ESP and creates illusions.
rakshasa.special_defenses: Immune to spells under 8th level. Can only be harmed by non-magical weapons or blessed crossbow bolts.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

rakshasa.description: A powerful, cunning evil fiend from the lower planes, resembling a tiger with hands that bend backward, known for its illusions and magic.

ram_giant.name: A massive mountain sheep, dangerous for its powerful horns and charging attack
ram_giant.description: A massive mountain sheep, dangerous for its powerful horns and charging attack.

rat_giant.name: Large, disease-carrying rodents that often swarm in sewers and dungeons
rat_giant.special_attacks: Disease: 5% chance per wound of causing disease (save vs. poison to avoid).
rat_giant.description: Large, disease-carrying rodents that often swarm in sewers and dungeons.

ray.name: Various types of flattened marine fish, including stingrays (with venomous barbs) and manta rays (harmless filter feeders)
ray.special_attacks: Manta: Swallow whole on 10% over 'to hit', tail spine stuns for 2-8 rounds. Pungi: Spines cause death (save vs. poison). Sting: Tail spine paralyzes for 5-20 turns (save vs. poison).
ray.description: Various types of flattened marine fish, including stingrays (with venomous barbs) and manta rays (harmless filter feeders).

remorhaz.name: A massive, worm-like creature that burrows through ice and snow, known for radiating intense heat from its body
remorhaz.special_attacks: Swallow whole on a score of 20.
remorhaz.special_defenses: Back protrusions glow cherry-red, melting non-magical weapons and dealing 10-100 damage to creatures touching them.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

remorhaz.description: A massive, worm-like creature that burrows through ice and snow, known for radiating intense heat from its body.

rhinoceros.name: A large, thick-skinned mammal with one or two horns, known for its massive charging attack
rhinoceros.special_attacks: Charge: double damage. Tramples for 2-8 damage.
rhinoceros.description: A large, thick-skinned mammal with one or two horns, known for its massive charging attack.

roc.name: A gigantic, mythical bird of prey, large enough to carry elephants and often nesting on inaccessible mountain peaks
roc.special_attacks: Swoops down on prey, seizes it in talons, and carries it off.
roc.description: A gigantic, mythical bird of prey, large enough to carry elephants and often nesting on inaccessible mountain peaks.

roper.name: A grotesque, rock-like creature with one massive eye and long, sticky strands that paralyze and drag victims toward its mouth
roper.special_attacks: 6 poisonous strands cause weakness (50% strength loss for 1-3 rounds). Drags prey to mouth.
roper.special_defenses: Unaffected by lightning, half damage from cold. Vulnerable to fire (-4 on saving throw).
roper.description: A grotesque, rock-like creature with one massive eye and long, sticky strands that paralyze and drag victims toward its mouth.

rot_grub.name: Tiny, flesh-eating worms that burrow into living tissue, requiring fire to remove them before they reach the heart
rot_grub.special_attacks: Burrow into flesh and reach the heart in 1-3 turns, killing the host.
rot_grub.description: Tiny, flesh-eating worms that burrow into living tissue, requiring fire to remove them before they reach the heart.

rust_monster.name: An insectoid creature that feeds exclusively on iron and ferrous metals, causing objects to instantly decay into rust
rust_monster.special_attacks: Antennae rust ferrous metals on contact. Magical items get a saving throw.
rust_monster.description: An insectoid creature that feeds exclusively on iron and ferrous metals, causing objects to instantly decay into rust.

sahuagin.name: A vicious, fish-like humanoid race (sea devils) that live in warlike, underwater kingdoms
sahuagin.special_attacks: Unarmed attacks with claws and teeth (1-2/1-2/1-4).
sahuagin.special_defenses: Keen senses of sight and hearing.
sahuagin.treasure_type: Individuals N; I, O, P, Q (x10), X, Y in lair
sahuagin.description: A vicious, fish-like humanoid race (sea devils) that live in warlike, underwater kingdoms.

salamander.name: A serpentine elemental creature of fire and heat, found in volcanic and extremely hot environments
salamander.special_attacks: Heat: Spear attack inflicts an additional 1-6 heat damage. Tail constricts for 2-12 damage plus 1-6 heat damage.
salamander.special_defenses: +1 or better weapon to hit. Immune to fire.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

salamander.description: A serpentine elemental creature of fire and heat, found in volcanic and extremely hot environments.

satyr.name: A benevolent humanoid with the legs and horns of a goat, known for their love of music, dancing, and revelry
satyr.special_attacks: Pipes can cause charm, sleep, or fear.
satyr.special_defenses: Surprised only on a 1, 90% undetectable in foliage.
satyr.description: A benevolent humanoid with the legs and horns of a goat, known for their love of music, dancing, and revelry.

scorpion_giant.name: A massive arachnid with crushing pincers and a highly venomous stinger on its tail
scorpion_giant.special_attacks: Poison sting: save vs. poison or die.
scorpion_giant.description: A massive arachnid with crushing pincers and a highly venomous stinger on its tail.

sea_hag.name: A hideous, evil aquatic humanoid (a type of hag) known for its ugliness and ability to paralyze with its horrifying gaze
sea_hag.special_attacks: Death look: sight causes weakness, save vs. magic or die.
sea_hag.description: A hideous, evil aquatic humanoid (a type of hag) known for its ugliness and ability to paralyze with its horrifying gaze.

sea_horse_giant.name: A large version of the marine fish, sometimes ridden by small aquatic humanoids
sea_horse_giant.description: A large version of the marine fish, sometimes ridden by small aquatic humanoids.

sea_lion.name: A large marine mammal, usually harmless but capable of defending itself fiercely
sea_lion.description: A large marine mammal, usually harmless but capable of defending itself fiercely.

shadow.name: An incorporeal undead creature that drains the strength and life force from its living victims
shadow.special_attacks: Strength drain: touch drains 1 point of strength.
shadow.special_defenses: +1 or better weapon to hit. 90% undetectable in shadows.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

shadow.description: An incorporeal undead creature that drains the strength and life force from its living victims.

shambling_mound.name: A massive, mobile plant creature resembling a mound of rotting vegetation, immune to lightning and capable of crushing and suffocating prey
shambling_mound.special_attacks: Suffocation: if both attacks hit, victim is entangled and suffocated in 2-8 rounds.
shambling_mound.special_defenses: Half damage from weapons. Immune to fire. Lightning causes it to grow 1 hit die. Cold does half or no damage.
shambling_mound.description: A massive, mobile plant creature resembling a mound of rotting vegetation, immune to lightning and capable of crushing and suffocating prey.

shark.name: A predatory marine fish known for its aggressive attacks and rows of sharp teeth
shark.special_attacks: Giant Shark: Swallow whole on 10% over 'to hit'.
shark.description: A predatory marine fish known for its aggressive attacks and rows of sharp teeth.

shedu.name: A benevolent celestial creature resembling a winged bull or lion with a human head, often guarding temples and portals
shedu.special_attacks: Psionic abilities: 3 major and 5 minor disciplines. Can cast clerical spells.
shedu.description: A benevolent celestial creature resembling a winged bull or lion with a human head, often guarding temples and portals.

shrieker.name: A type of sedentary fungal growth that lets out a painful, deafening shriek when approached by light or movement
shrieker.special_defenses: Noise: Shrieks when light is within 30' or movement within 10'.
shrieker.description: A type of sedentary fungal growth that lets out a painful, deafening shriek when approached by light or movement.

skeleton.name: A common type of animated undead, consisting of the reanimated bones of a deceased humanoid
skeleton.special_defenses: Half damage from sharp/edged weapons. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, and cold-based spells.
skeleton.description: A common type of animated undead, consisting of the reanimated bones of a deceased humanoid.

skunk_giant.name: A massive version of the black-and-white mammal, capable of spraying a blinding, highly noxious musk over a wide area
skunk_giant.special_attacks: Squirt musk: blinds for 1-8 hours and causes nausea (50% strength and dexterity loss for 2-8 turns).
skunk_giant.description: A massive version of the black-and-white mammal, capable of spraying a blinding, highly noxious musk over a wide area.

slithering_tracker.name: A stealthy, amorphous creature that can flatten itself to the size of a snake to pursue victims through narrow spaces
slithering_tracker.special_attacks: Paralyzation: paralyzes sleeping victim and drains plasma from body in 6 turns.
slithering_tracker.description: A stealthy, amorphous creature that can flatten itself to the size of a snake to pursue victims through narrow spaces.

slug_giant.name: A massive, slow-moving terrestrial mollusk with a corrosive trail of slime
slug_giant.special_attacks: Spit acid: 50% chance to hit at 6", spits every other round.
slug_giant.special_defenses: Immune to blunt weapons. Thick, rubbery hide.
slug_giant.description: A massive, slow-moving terrestrial mollusk with a corrosive trail of slime.

snake_giant.name: A massive, constricting or venomous serpentine reptile, including types like the giant constrictor or spitting cobra
snake_giant.description: A massive, constricting or venomous serpentine reptile, including types like the giant constrictor or spitting cobra.

spectre.name: A powerful, incorporeal undead creature that haunts lonely places, capable of draining life force with its touch
spectre.special_attacks: Energy drain: touch drains 2 life energy levels.
spectre.special_defenses: +1 or better weapon to hit. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, cold, poison, paralysis.
spectre.description: A powerful, incorporeal undead creature that haunts lonely places, capable of draining life force with its touch.

sphinx.name: A highly intelligent, usually benevolent creature with the head of a man and the body of a lion, known for guarding secrets and posing riddles
sphinx.special_attacks: Andro: Roar causes fear, paralysis, strength loss, and deafness. Gyno: Clerical and magic-user spells.
sphinx.alignment: Chaotic good (Andro-), Neutral (Crio-), Neutral (Gyno-), Chaotic evil (Hieraco-)
sphinx.size: L (8' tall), L (7 1/2' tall), L (7' tall), L (7' tall)

U.Maps or Magic: 1 of each magic excluding potions & scrolls: 70%

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

sphinx.description: A highly intelligent, usually benevolent creature with the head of a man and the body of a lion, known for guarding secrets and posing riddles.

spider.name: A common arachnid, including giant and venomous varieties, often found in webs and dark places
spider.alignment: Chaotic evil (Giant), Neutral (Huge), Neutral (Large), Neutral (Phase), Neutral (Water)
spider.treasure_type: C (Giant), J-N, Q (Huge), J, K (Large), E (Phase), J-N, Q (Water)
spider.description: A common arachnid, including giant and venomous varieties, often found in webs and dark places.

sprite.name: A tiny, winged faerie known for their arrows tipped with sleeping poison
sprite.special_attacks: Sleep arrows: save vs. poison or fall into a comatose sleep for 1-6 hours.
sprite.special_defenses: Invisibility at will. -4 to be hit.
sprite.description: A tiny, winged faerie known for their arrows tipped with sleeping poison.

squid_giant.name: A massive marine cephalopod with powerful tentacles and a large beak, capable of dragging victims to the deep
squid_giant.special_attacks: Constriction: Tentacles constrict for 2-12 damage per round.
squid_giant.description: A massive marine cephalopod with powerful tentacles and a large beak, capable of dragging victims to the deep.

stag.name: A male deer, usually peaceful but dangerous for its antlers during mating season
stag.description: A male deer, usually peaceful but dangerous for its antlers during mating season.

stirge.name: A small, winged, bat-like creature with a needle-like proboscis that sucks the blood of its victims
stirge.special_attacks: Drain blood: drains 1-4 hp of blood each round after hitting.
stirge.description: A small, winged, bat-like creature with a needle-like proboscis that sucks the blood of its victims.

strangle_weed.name: A dangerous plant that grows in shallow water, lashing out with vine-like tendrils to drown or suffocate prey
strangle_weed.special_attacks: Entwines victim, causing crushing damage equal to strength difference.
strangle_weed.description: A dangerous plant that grows in shallow water, lashing out with vine-like tendrils to drown or suffocate prey.

su-monster.name: A small, cat-like creature with a prehensile tail, possessing powerful psychic abilities that drain the mental energy of its victims
su-monster.special_attacks: Psionic attack: psychic crush, psionic blast, or mind thrust.
su-monster.description: A small, cat-like creature with a prehensile tail, possessing powerful psychic abilities that drain the mental energy of its victims.

sylph.name: A benevolent female elemental spirit of air, often appearing as a beautiful, winged woman
sylph.special_attacks: Magic use at 7th level. Can conjure an air elemental once per week.
sylph.description: A benevolent female elemental spirit of air, often appearing as a beautiful, winged woman.

thought_eater.name: A small, invisible, reptilian creature that feeds on the mental energy (intelligence) of sentient beings
thought_eater.special_attacks: Feeds on mental energy and intelligence.
thought_eater.special_defenses: Can only be attacked by ethereal creatures.
thought_eater.description: A small, invisible, reptilian creature that feeds on the mental energy (intelligence) of sentient beings.

tick_giant.name: A massive arachnid parasite that latches onto hosts and rapidly drains blood
tick_giant.special_attacks: Blood drain: drains 1-6 hp of blood per round after hitting. 50% chance of causing disease.
tick_giant.description: A massive arachnid parasite that latches onto hosts and rapidly drains blood.

tiger.name: A solitary, striped great cat, known for its stealth and immense power
tiger.description: A solitary, striped great cat, known for its stealth and immense power.

titan.name: One of the original, primordial giants, typically possessing divine power and controlling aspects of nature
titan.special_attacks: Magic-user and clerical spells of 4th-7th level. Can use symbol spells and unholy word once per day.
titan.special_defenses: Can become invisible or ethereal twice per day. Immune to psionic attacks.
titan.description: One of the original, primordial giants, typically possessing divine power and controlling aspects of nature.

titanothere.name: A massive, extinct rhinoceros-like mammal, known for the large bony knobs on its snout
titanothere.description: A massive, extinct rhinoceros-like mammal, known for the large bony knobs on its snout.

toad_giant.name: A massive, warty amphibian with a paralyzing or poisonous bite
toad_giant.special_attacks: Ice: Radiates cold in a 1" radius for 3-18 damage. Poisonous: Bite requires a save vs. poison or die.
toad_giant.description: A massive, warty amphibian with a paralyzing or poisonous bite.

trapper.name: A carnivorous creature that lies on the floor of a dungeon, perfectly mimicking stone, wood, or packed earth to trap unsuspecting victims
trapper.special_attacks: Closes around prey, dealing 4 + armor class damage per turn. Smothers in 6 rounds.
trapper.special_defenses: Resistant to fire and cold (half or no damage).
trapper.description: A carnivorous creature that lies on the floor of a dungeon, perfectly mimicking stone, wood, or packed earth to trap unsuspecting victims.

treant.name: A massive, sentient tree, typically benevolent and acting as a guardian of the forest
treant.description: A massive, sentient tree, typically benevolent and acting as a guardian of the forest.

triton.name: An aquatic humanoid race with the upper body of a man and the lower body of a fish, known for protecting the seas
triton.special_attacks: Conch shell horns can calm rough waters, summon sea creatures, or cause marine creatures to flee.
triton.description: An aquatic humanoid race with the upper body of a man and the lower body of a fish, known for protecting the seas.

troglodyte.name: A primitive, subterranean reptilian humanoid race known for their overwhelming stench and tribal life
troglodyte.special_attacks: Revulsion odor: secretion causes strength loss of 1 point per round for 1-6 rounds (save vs. poison to avoid).
troglodyte.special_defenses: Chameleon-like power to change skin color, surprising on 1-4.
troglodyte.description: A primitive, subterranean reptilian humanoid race known for their overwhelming stench and tribal life.

troll.name: A grotesque, regenerating giant known for its green skin, long arms, and weakness to fire and acid
troll.special_defenses: Regeneration: regenerates 3 hp per round, 3 rounds after being damaged.
troll.description: A grotesque, regenerating giant known for its green skin, long arms, and weakness to fire and acid.

turtle.name: A massive reptile, terrestrial or aquatic, capable of crushing foes with its shell or jaws
turtle.special_attacks: Sea, Giant: Can upset small vessels. Snapping, Giant: Surprises on 1-4, shoots neck out 10' to bite.
turtle.special_defenses: Can withdraw head and limbs for better armor class.
turtle.description: A massive reptile, terrestrial or aquatic, capable of crushing foes with its shell or jaws.

umber_hulk.name: A massive, four-armed subterranean insectoid creature whose eyes cause confusion in those who meet its gaze
umber_hulk.special_attacks: Confusion: Gaze confuses for 3-12 rounds unless save vs. magic is made.
umber_hulk.description: A massive, four-armed subterranean insectoid creature whose eyes cause confusion in those who meet its gaze.

unicorn.name: A beautiful, equine creature with a spiraling horn, known for its purity, healing powers, and avoidance of evil
unicorn.special_attacks: Charge: Horn strikes for double damage (2-24) with +2 to hit.
unicorn.special_defenses: Surprised only on 1, senses enemy at 24", teleport 36" once per day. Immune to poison, charm, hold, and death spells.
unicorn.description: A beautiful, equine creature with a spiraling horn, known for its purity, healing powers, and avoidance of evil.

vampire.name: A classic undead creature that sustains itself by draining the blood and life energy of the living
vampire.special_attacks: Energy drain: touch drains 2 life energy levels. Gaze can charm. Can summon bats, rats, or wolves.
vampire.special_defenses: +1 or better weapon to hit. Regenerates 3 hp/round. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, poison, paralysis. Takes half damage from cold or electricity.

F.Maps or Magic: Any 3 except sword or misc. weapon: plus 1 potion & 1 scroll: 30%

vampire.description: A classic undead creature that sustains itself by draining the blood and life energy of the living.

wasp_giant.name: A massive flying insect with a painful, often venomous sting
wasp_giant.special_attacks: Poison: sting causes permanent paralysis (save vs. poison).
wasp_giant.description: A massive flying insect with a painful, often venomous sting.

water_weird.name: A malevolent elemental creature composed of animated water, typically found in lakes or deep pools, that attempts to drown its victims
water_weird.special_attacks: Drowning: drags victim into water (save vs. paralyzation to avoid).
water_weird.special_defenses: Only harmed by blunt weapons, fire (half damage), or purify water spell (kills).
water_weird.description: A malevolent elemental creature composed of animated water, typically found in lakes or deep pools, that attempts to drown its victims.

weasel_giant.name: A massive, predatory mammal known for its speed and bloodlust
weasel_giant.special_attacks: Drain blood: sucks blood for 2-12 damage per round after hitting.
weasel_giant.description: A massive, predatory mammal known for its speed and bloodlust.

whale.name: Any of a variety of massive marine mammals, including aggressive and territorial killer whales
whale.special_attacks: Tail: can smash with tail for damage equal to half its hit dice.
whale.description: Any of a variety of massive marine mammals, including aggressive and territorial killer whales.

wight.name: A powerful undead creature that drains the life energy (levels) of its living victims with a chilling touch
wight.special_attacks: Energy drain: touch drains 1 life energy level.
wight.special_defenses: Silver or magic weapons to hit. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, cold, poison, paralysis.
wight.description: A powerful undead creature that drains the life energy (levels) of its living victims with a chilling touch.

will-o-wisp.name: A small, floating ball of light that lures travelers to their deaths in bogs and dangerous areas
will-o-wisp.special_attacks: Can grow bright or dim, or blank out its glow entirely for 2-8 rounds.
will-o-wisp.special_defenses: Immune to most spells except protection from evil, magic missile, and maze.
will-o-wisp.description: A small, floating ball of light that lures travelers to their deaths in bogs and dangerous areas.

wind_walker.name: A powerful elemental creature of air, resembling a translucent humanoid, known for moving at great speeds
wind_walker.special_attacks: Wind force attack damages all creatures within 10'.
wind_walker.special_defenses: Ethereal. Can only be harmed by specific creatures or spells like control weather, slow, or ice storm.
wind_walker.description: A powerful elemental creature of air, resembling a translucent humanoid, known for moving at great speeds.

wolf.name: A predatory canine, usually found in packs and known for its tracking and hunting skills
wolf.special_attacks: Winter: Frost breath causes 6-24 damage (save for half).
wolf.description: A predatory canine, usually found in packs and known for its tracking and hunting skills.

wolverine.name: A small, fierce mammal known for its aggressive nature and disproportionate strength
wolverine.special_attacks: Musk: equivalent to a skunk's musk.
wolverine.description: A small, fierce mammal known for its aggressive nature and disproportionate strength.

wraith.name: A powerful, incorporeal undead creature that appears as a dark, shadowy figure and drains the vitality from living creatures
wraith.special_attacks: Energy drain: touch drains 1 life energy level.
wraith.special_defenses: Silver (half damage) or magic weapons to hit. Immune to sleep, charm, hold, cold, poison, paralysis.
wraith.description: A powerful, incorporeal undead creature that appears as a dark, shadowy figure and drains the vitality from living creatures.

wyvern.name: A two-legged dragon relative with wings and a venomous stinger on its tail, known for its bestial nature
wyvern.special_attacks: Poison: tail sting requires save vs. poison or die.
wyvern.description: A two-legged dragon relative with wings and a venomous stinger on its tail, known for its bestial nature.

xorn.name: A creature from the Elemental Plane of Earth that is capable of phasing through stone and earth, known for its appetite for minerals and gems
xorn.special_defenses: Immune to fire and cold. Half damage from lightning. Can pass through stone and earth.
xorn.description: A creature from the Elemental Plane of Earth that is capable of phasing through stone and earth, known for its appetite for minerals and gems.

yeti.name: A massive, ape-like creature of the frigid mountains, known for its white fur and paralyzing cold attack
yeti.special_attacks: Gaze causes fright and paralysis for 3 rounds (save vs. paralysis to avoid). A successful hit with a 20 allows it to squeeze for 2-16 additional damage.
yeti.special_defenses: Impervious to cold. Nearly invisible until within 10-30'.
yeti.description: A massive, ape-like creature of the frigid mountains, known for its white fur and paralyzing cold attack.

zombie.name: A common, slow-moving undead creature, the animated corpse of a deceased humanoid
zombie.special_defenses: Immune to sleep, charm, hold, and cold-based spells.
zombie.description: A common, slow-moving undead creature, the animated corpse of a deceased humanoid.
